lines.text: I'm not going into any clinic!
The only monster in this house comes in a bottle!
Tell me - what did I ever do to get mixed up in your lousy karma?
I'm very good at this - I used to be a misogynist.
You have done well - you will now join me.
Feel me - enjoy me - love me always.
I sense an omnipresence in this house.
Avoid all vice and passion - it preys on human frailty
